bills.title: Clarify timelines and opening procedures for public charter schools
Revise laws related to the conduct of school district elections
Revise legislative oversight of administrative rules and encourage public comment
Clarify the duties the superintendent of public instruction and the board of public education.
Revise laws related to the school funding interim commission.
Revise education funding laws by replacing school district BASE levies with countywide BASE levies
Generally revise education laws related to out-of-district attendance.
Generally revise laws related to public charter schools
Revise election laws to provide for verification of an elector’s citizenship.
Revise laws relating to the adult basic education fund and its distribution.
Revise laws regarding Idaho college of osteopathic medicine program
Implementing cost reporting for certain Medicaid service provider types
Eliminate statutory reference to the adult basic education fund and its distribution
Encourage academic excellence through high-quality instructional materials
Revise transformational learning laws to create a phase II grant program
Revise laws related to educating children receiving in-state inpatient treatment of serious emotional disturbances
Establish prompt cost report reimbursement act
Authorize transfers and other necessary measure to implement HB 2 section E
